question.body: A patient with a severe case of pneumonia will be hypoxic (cells are not getting enough oxygen). Pneumonia is a lung infection which results in an accumulation of pus and mucus around the air sacs (alveoli) of the lungs. What do you think will happen to the diffusion rate of O2 in such a patient?

multiple_choice.choice: There would not be a change

response.feedback: Incorrect. Think about the thickness of the medium that the O2 would have to diffuse through and how that affects diffusion rate.
Correct. The increased secretions increase the distance the O2 must travel and slows diffusion.
